backend/main.mo: Defines core actor with health check, authorization mixin, user approval state, order and design entry types, and comparison helpers for sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata, theme colors, and icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing basic caching for offline support with install, fetch, and activate handlers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and bootstrap logic handling authentication, profile loading, admin checks, and timeout-based error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders access denied message with navigation button for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Displays profile/bootstrap errors with retry and logout actions plus error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling auth state, errors, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Displays a screen for authenticated users without a profile, showing their principal ID and instructions for admin setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first-time admin users to enter their name, triggering initial profile setup and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Restricts children rendering to users with allowed roles, showing a loader or access denied when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Catches unhandled UI errors and shows a recovery screen with error details, reload, and logout options.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel showing raw technical error details with clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Inline error alert with optional retry button and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Dropdown menu providing multiple order export options using the exportOrders utility.
Main application shell handling layout, navigation, and role‑based menu rendering for mobile and desktop.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Dialog for adding or editing master design mappings, handling form state and save mutations.
Dialog for uploading and parsing master design files, showing parsed entries, errors, and initiating import mutations.
Displays master designs in a table with edit and activate/deactivate actions using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Preview table for ingested orders highlighting unmapped design codes and customer orders.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Filter bar for orders providing karigar, date range, customer-order-only, and status filters with reset support.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Orders table showing order details with optional status update selector and customer-order highlighting.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: Header indicator showing backend reachability with refresh control and collapsible error details when offline.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Displays online/offline status and queued sync items, allowing manual sync when online.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically checks backend health via actor.healthCheck and classifies errors to determine online/offline status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Provides clipboard copy functionality with simple success/error status and dynamic button labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile using a safe actor, handling auth errors and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and provides a context for authentication actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for orders, master designs, admin checks, and related mutations using an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a resilient backend actor with optional secret initialization and safer error handling without blocking execution.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Filters orders by type and exports them as a downloadable CSV file.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Maps orders to master design entries and separates unmapped orders and design codes.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes aggregate order metrics including totals and karigar-wise breakdowns.
Checks if an order type string represents a customer order.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Parses master design mappings from an Excel workbook using flexible column matching.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses orders from an Excel workbook, validating fields and converting values to an Order object.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Loads the XLSX library if needed and reads an uploaded Excel file into a workbook.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Parses master design files from PDF or Excel, delegating to appropriate parsers.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Parses order files from PDF or Excel and returns normalized Order objects.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Dynamically loads PDF.js and extracts raw text from each page of a PDF file.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Parses PDF-extracted text into master design entries by detecting headers and splitting rows into design code, generic name, and karigar name. Ensures uniqueness and throws errors when parsing fails.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Stub that always throws an error indicating PDF order parsing is not implemented.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity context and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Implements IndexedDB wrapper for caching orders, master designs, sync queue items, and metadata with CRUD helpers.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: React hook that syncs queued offline ingestions with the backend, updates sync timestamps, and refreshes queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays admin dashboard with date filtering, metrics, loading states, error handling, and orders table.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Provides UI for listing, searching, adding, editing, and importing master design mappings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Form for creating user profiles with validation, role selection, error handling, and success feedback.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Loads assigned orders, computes metrics, and displays summary cards plus an editable orders table with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with branding, background image, and a login button.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: Provides a form to enter a bootstrap admin token, stores it, invalidates actor queries, and redirects after success.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Handles uploading and parsing order files, maps designs, shows previews and errors, and submits parsed orders to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Displays all orders with filters, export options, error states, and a link to the ingestion workflow.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: Lists unmapped design codes with search and allows adding new master design mappings via a dialog.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap errors, detects stopped-canister conditions, extracts canister IDs, and produces safe error strings.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Wraps errors into friendly messages using bootstrap classification and provides helpers for stopped-canister messaging.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params (including hash), storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them, with fallback and persistence helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the app’s architecture, features, issues, and versioning for the KarigarFlow system.
